targets.rawSql: SELECT created_at AS time, context_precision AS value, 'context_precision' AS metric FROM rag_eval_metrics WHERE dataset = ${dataset:sqlstring} ORDER BY created_at
SELECT created_at AS time, context_recall AS value, 'context_recall' AS metric FROM rag_eval_metrics WHERE dataset = ${dataset:sqlstring} ORDER BY created_at
SELECT created_at AS time, faithfulness AS value, 'faithfulness' AS metric FROM rag_eval_metrics WHERE dataset = ${dataset:sqlstring} ORDER BY created_at
SELECT created_at AS time, answer_relevancy AS value, 'answer_relevancy' AS metric FROM rag_eval_metrics WHERE dataset = ${dataset:sqlstring} ORDER BY created_at
SELECT created_at, dataset, context_precision, context_recall, faithfulness, answer_relevancy FROM rag_eval_metrics WHERE dataset = ${dataset:sqlstring} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1

list.name: dataset
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dataset FROM rag_eval_metrics ORDER BY dataset
